mapper.select: SELECT sku.id,sku.sku_code,sku.sku_name,sku.product_id,sku.thumb_img,sku.sale_price,sku.market_price,sku.cost_price,sku.stock_num,sku.sale_num,sku.sku_spec,sku.weight,sku.volume,sku.status,sku.create_time,sku.update_time,sku.is_deleted FROM product_sku sku JOIN product p ON sku.product_id = p.id WHERE sku.is_deleted = 0 AND p.is_deleted = 0 AND p.status = 1 ORDER BY sku.sale_num DESC LIMIT 2
